message: Hey folks, I've written some tutorials (aimed at beginners) that walk you through the process of building an android app with Ti Mobile. http://query7.com/titanium-mobile-android-development-first-application (links to others at the start of the post). If you have any tutorial requests (don't need to be beginner specific) I'd be happy to write em ^^
Curious -- why is it an 'Android' tutorial specifically?  Shouldn't the same code work for an iPhone as well?
The first app uses Android intents and I don't have an Apple device/setup to test/make the iOS equivilant.

@lastkarrde Ahhh.  I asked because I'm dumb on Titanium. To date, I have yet to even be able to deploy the Hello World.  I didn't realize that there was anything you could do, within an application, that would bias an application towards a given platform.
Actually Ti for Android is different than for Iphone.  Lots of platform specific quirks.
